name: hm07
effect: Teaches Waterfall to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches a move to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III & II: Waterfall)

flavor_text.sun_moon: Diving on the first turn, the user floats up and attacks on the next turn.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Diving on the first turn, the user floats up and attacks on the next turn.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Diving on the first turn, the user floats up and attacks on the next turn.
